#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

int main()
{
	int t;
	ll ans,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		if(n == 1)
		{
			printf("1\n");
			continue;
		}
		ans = (n*n)/2 -1;
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
